mapper.sql: id, name, occu_describe, type, create_time, modify_time, create_man, modify_man, remark
mapper.select: SELECT o.name FROM customer c LEFT JOIN customer_occupation co ON c.customer_id=co.customer_id LEFT JOIN occupation o ON co.occupation_id=o.id WHERE c.customer_id=#{customerId}
mapper.insert:
insert into occupation
id,
name,
occu_describe,
type,
create_time,
modify_time,
create_man,
modify_man,
remark,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

#{occuDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update occupation
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
occu_describe = #{occuDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_man = #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update occupation set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, occu_describe = #{occuDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_man = #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
